XOR Classification Task Generator

Source: R/TaskGeneratorXor.R

A TaskGenerator for the xor task in mlbench::mlbench.xor().

Format

R6::R6Class inheriting from TaskGenerator.

Construction

TaskGeneratorXor$new()
mlr_task_generators$get("xor")
tgen("xor")

See also

Dictionary of TaskGenerators: mlr_task_generators

Examples

tgen("xor")$generate(10)$data()
#>     classes         x.1         x.2
#>  1:       2 -0.39226921 -0.39240202
#>  2:       1  0.11354093 -0.91234177
#>  3:       2  0.28351948  0.59765687
#>  4:       2  0.23878671  0.56678654
#>  5:       2  0.03403474  0.96107380
#>  6:       1  0.03898664 -0.03090557
#>  7:       1 -0.46917244  0.12816599
#>  8:       2  0.17322797  0.82549605
#>  9:       2 -0.83362081 -0.88590234
#> 10:       1  0.77449087 -0.51779060
